actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the Senate that a quorum of the House is ready to proceed with business.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to inform the Senate that the House is ready to proceed with business.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to inform the Senate that a quorum of the House is ready to proceed with business.
